snippet: The legal steps that played out this week over same-sex marriage is a prime example of why the Supreme Court needs to settle the issue.
abstract: Editorial contends confusing events surrounding Supreme Court decision to issue emergency stay of ruling that struck down same-sex marriage ban in Idaho underscores need for court to settle issue; maintains court has dodged clear opportunities to decide fate of same-sex marriage and, in the process, has harmed same-sex couples and their families.
lead_paragraph: The legal steps that played out this week over same-sex marriage is a prime example of why the Supreme Court needs to settle the issue.

headline.main: Mistakes and Confusion on Marriage Equality
headline.print_headline: Mistakes and Confusion on Marriage Equality

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
